task.title: How to Add Tweet Button in WebHelp Output
task.shortdesc: See how you can add a Twitter widget into WebHelp output.

context.p: To add a Twitter Tweet widget to your WebHelp output, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Go to Tweet button generator page.

step.stepresult: The Preview and code area displays the code.

step.cmd: Copy the code snippet displayed in the Preview and code area into a div element inside an XML file called tweet-button.xml.
Duplicate an existing WebHelp transformation scenario (depending on your needs, it may be with or without feedback, or the mobile variant).
Switch to the Parameters tab and edit the webhelp.footer.file parameter to reference the tweet-button.xml file created earlier.
